name: VR-AudioVisual - ApartmentLoop#1
description:
This VR application is exported from a realtime audio visual animation "ApartmentLoop#1".Music comes from Italian composer Bruno bavota (https://brunobavota.com/) 's newest electronic ablum. Visual and program by Wenzy(ziyangwen) (https://twitter.com/ziyangwen).

Video version:

VR version

ScreenShot


HOW TO PLAY
You can walk around and enjoy this performance in a virtual environment. Press trigger to interact with the particles. 

There are two way for locomotion.

* Press two triggers at the same time to fly

* Joystick for walking around and press button A/B to move up and down

Hardware

* This application is using XR interaction toolkit so it should support most of the VR hardware. Such as Oculus Quest,Oculus Rift/s,HTC Vive/Pro , HTC Cosmos,Valve index ~
* This VR application needs a high performance PC, graphic card not less than GTX1070( in 980 fps is around 40)
* On my recent testing, this application can run smoothly above 70fps in a GTX 1070 card with Oculus Quest by oculus link( Press key F can see framerate in this application). If you find the framerate is abnormal. Please follow the tips below.

Performance Tips
* Update your graphics card drivers to newest
* Update your VR device drivers to newest
* Update VR steam, goto the page. Set the Render resolution to CUSTOM,set the resolution close to your device's resolution.(If u are using Oculus quest, set it to 1400 * 1600 will significantly improve the performance
